2.Title: The Express Passenger's Guide to the Galaxy

3.Title: My Heart Lies With the Stars
3.Desc: Launch a journey into the vast Galaxy
3.SubDesc: ※ Congratulations! You've boarded the Astral Express!

3.Title: Everwinter Night
3.SubDesc: ※ You have arrived at the city named Belobog

3.Title: Half the Wizard of Oz
3.Desc: Defeat the tin man and the little girl
3.SubDesc: ※ Svarog and Clara became your friends!

3.Title: Winter Is Leaving
3.Desc: Let's change Belobog, starting with me!
3.SubDesc: ※ Step One: Defeat Supreme Guardian Cocolia...

3.Title: Sauntering Fox
3.Desc: Diplomacy is but a trade of opinions...
3.SubDesc: ※ Confer with the leader(s) of the Xianzhou Luofu

3.Title: Omniscia Spares None
3.Desc: What goes around comes around. No rogue shall escape capture.
3.SubDesc: ※ Successfully capture the Stellaron Hunter Kafka

3.Title: A Professional Onlooker
3.SubDesc: ※ Find Qingque, who is "working hard" at playing games...

3.Title: Slayer of a Very "Deer" Friend
3.Desc: Try to walk on the Path of The Hunt...
3.SubDesc: ※ Help Xianzhou to defeat the Abomination of Abundance, "Ebon Deer"

3.Title: Prophets Do Not Prophesize
3.Desc: Witness the mystery of the Divination Commission's matrix
3.SubDesc: ※ Interrogate Kafka with the Matrix of Prescience, and challenge the divination with this foresight...

3.Title: The Deer Hunter
3.Desc: The furnace undoused, the deer silenced
3.SubDesc: ※ Save the Artisanship Commission from the crisis

3.Title: Draconic Opulence
3.SubDesc: ※ Discover Dan Shu's true identity and witness the rise of the Disciples of Sanctus Medicus

4.Title: Glued to Books
4.Desc: Collect 30 readable items from the Xianzhou Luofu

4.Title: Learned in All Things
4.Desc: Collect 80 readable items from the Xianzhou Luofu

4.Title: Proper Role-Playing Gamer
4.Desc: Open Treasures 30 times on the Herta Space Station

4.Title: Until the Light Takes Us
4.Desc: Activate 5 Space Anchors in the Herta Space Station

4.Title: Sisyphus of the Mines
4.Desc: Complete the final Mine Cart Test

4.Title: Unearthly Marvel
4.Desc: Find all of the Unearthly Marvel treasures

4.Title: Red-Name Alert
4.Desc: Complete the Formidable Foe Challenge 5 time(s)

4.Title: High-Level Domination
4.Desc: Complete the Formidable Foe Challenge 15 time(s)

4.Title: The Birth of Tragedy
4.Desc: Find all of The Fool's Box treasures

4.Title: Red to Red and White to White
You Want Me to Raid Without Achievements?
Take by Surprise
4.Desc: Enter combat with attacks of corresponding Types for 100 time(s)

4.Title: Sensory Socialization
4.Desc: Collect all Memory Bubbles scattered on the Herta Space Station

4.Title: Where the Celestial Path May Lead
4.Desc: Activate 10 Space Anchors on the Xianzhou Luofu

4.Title: A Drop in the Bucket
4.Desc: Open Treasures 100 time(s) on the Xianzhou Luofu

4.Title: Don't You Dare Waste It
4.Desc: Get Jim Roger Bread Soda from a trash can

4.Title: Dissertation Proposal
4.Desc: Collect 10 readable item(s) in the Herta Space Station

4.Title: Literature Review
4.Desc: Collect 50 readable item(s) in the Herta Space Station

5.Title: Guess Who I Am

5.Desc: Complete Companion Mission "Hook's Gift"

5.Desc: Complete Companion Mission "Blizzard Immunity"

5.Title: Serval's Faithfull: An Autobiography
5.Desc: Complete Companion Mission "Only A Child"

5.Title: Seventeen's Map
5.Desc: Find all readable items regarding Asta in the mission "Emptiness of Locus Silentii"

5.Title: Diamond and Rust
5.Desc: Give the log to Bernard in the mission, "To: The Faint Star"

5.Title: Farewell, Comet Hunter
5.Desc: Collect three "Letters From the Comet Hunter" in the mission "Out of Reach"

5.Title: Does She Walk Alone?
5.Desc: Complete the mission "Guide Paradox" and witness the android's ending

5.Title: Close Encounters of the Sixth Kind
5.Desc: Obtain the ability to communicate with Wubbaboos in the mission "Requiem Mass"

5.Title: Greed Psychology
5.Desc: Obtain the real treasure in the mission "Survival Wisdom"

5.Title: One Day More
5.Desc: Find all of Julian's items in the mission "Hook's Treasure"

5.Title: The Lifecycle of Software Objects
5.Desc: Choose not to format Little Robot in the mission "Rarely Affectionate (Part 2)"

5.Title: For a Breath I Tarry
5.Desc: Choose to format Little Robot in the mission "Rarely Affectionate (Part 2)"

5.Title: Disposable
5.Desc: Find and talk to all Herta puppets in the space station

5.Title: When Breath Becomes Air
5.Desc: Visit the researcher Eikura Shuu's memorial

5.Title: Bzzt! Clock Out!
5.Desc: Turn off the little robots in the space station 6 times

5.Title: Door to A New World
5.Desc: Use the Curio "Door to A New World"

5.Title: Just A Number
5.Desc: Use the Curio "Rating Pistol"

5.Title: No King Rules Forever
5.Desc: Use the Curio "Unbearable Weight" and decipher the contents of the mysterious sound

5.Title: Green Thumb
5.Desc: Talk with the strange plant and visit it again on the next day

5.Title: Twinkly, Winkly
5.Desc: Obtain 3 Ancient Coin(s)

5.Title: Hurt Locker
5.Desc: Solve the crisis at the Belobog cable car station while also avoiding ethical risks

5.Title: Knight in Shining Armor
5.Desc: Find the language module and give it to Fidora the amateur mechanic

5.Title: The Mandela Effect
5.Desc: Contact Belobog's "back alley"

5.Title: Natural Immunity
5.Desc: Obtain the recipe for fried rice from talking with Gertie at the Goethe Grand Hotel

5.Title: Lā Lá Lǎ Là Land
5.Desc: Obtain the score for the phonograph from talking with Tamila at the Golden Theater

5.Title: Winter City Trap
5.Desc: Finish listening to the vagrant's rap

5.Title: For Ages 12 and Up
5.Desc: Participate in the Dark Fist Tournament and become the ultimate winner

5.Title: The Kelly Gang
5.Desc: Excavate the treasure hidden in the Belobog Administrative District's fountain

5.Title: The Banality of Evil
5.Desc: Finish all the Fool's Box puzzles in the mission "Vessel of Mediocrity"

5.Title: The Fourth Little Mole
5.Desc: Find all hidden treasures in the Mission "The Adventurous Moles"

5.Title: The Adventurous Moles Super Grown-Up Edition
5.Desc: Buy The Adventurous Moles: Hidden Treasure from the Belobog Book Merchant

5.Title: A Simple Life
5.Desc: Receive a text from Luhui after completing the mission "Fired"

5.Title: Carpe Diem, Festina Lente, and Tempus Fugit
5.Desc: Revving up, Losing Steam and Running On Empty.\nReceive all the texts about Chengjie's fading passion after completing the mission "A Teacher and a Friend"

5.Title: Cyber Fraud
5.Desc: Choose to have the Foxian Beauty turn themselves in during the mission "From Xianzhou With Love"

5.Title: Tootsie
5.Desc: Choose to have the Foxian Beauty reveal their true identity during the mission "From Xianzhou With Love"

5.Title: A Secret Makes a Woman, Woman.
5.Desc: Choose to let the Foxian Beauty continue the ruse during the mission "From Xianzhou With Love"

5.Title: The Seven Errors of Cycranes: Sloth
5.Desc: Convince the depressed cycrane to return to its job

5.Title: Seven Birds in the Hand Is Worth A Thousand in the Bush
5.Desc: Help Heron Express to recover all lost cycranes

5.Title: Fair and Square
5.Desc: Win the Xianzhou Luofu Competitive Eater Championship openly and fairly

5.Title: All Is Fair in Love and War
5.Desc: Win the Xianzhou Luofu Competitive Eater Championship in underhanded ways

5.Title: From Hero to Zero
5.Desc: Lose the Xianzhou Luofu Competitive Eater Championship

5.Title: Far From the Madding Crowd
5.Desc: Talk with the Immortal in a Vase and obtain its gift from the vase

5.Title: Let the Wind Blow Where It May
5.Desc: Talk with the Immortal in a Vase and refuse its gift

5.Title: Hasta la vista, Hexanexus!
5.Desc: Complete 15 Hexanexus challenge(s) from the Hex Club

5.Title: Rubik's Headache
5.Desc: Complete 15 new Hexanexus challenge(s) from the Hex Club

5.Title: Labor Omnia Vincit
5.Desc: Examine file cabinets in the Seat of Divine Foresight 7 time(s)

5.Title: The Crimes That Bind
5.Desc: Stop the strange tourist from throwing a coin into the starskiff engine

5.Title: Flight Cancelled
5.Desc: Help the strange tourist to throw a coin into the starskiff engine

5.Title: Lost and Found
5.Desc: Retrieved the credits that the fraudster took

5.Title: Leave It There
5.Desc: Did not retrieve the credits that the fraudster took

5.Title: Have Your Cake and Eat It
5.Desc: Retrieved more credits from the fraudster than what they took

5.Title: The Seven Errors of Cycranes: Lust
5.Desc: Follow the gentlemanly cycrane to find the picture book withheld by customs

5.Title: The Seven Errors of Cycranes: Gluttony
5.Desc: Complete a bet with the dissatisfied cycrane

5.Title: The Seven Errors of Cycranes: Greed
5.Desc: Explore the "mountain of deliveries" protected by the "evil dragon"

5.Title: The Seven Errors of Cycranes: Envy
5.Desc: Complete the challenge from the resentful cycrane

5.Title: The Seven Errors of Cycranes: Wrath
5.Desc: Defeat the highwaymen with the brave cycrane

5.Title: The Seven Errors of Cycranes: Pride
5.Desc: Complete the challenge from the "Four Great Villains of the Luofu (Self-Proclaimed)"

5.Title: Dance Like A Butterfly, Sting Like A Bee
5.Desc: Dominate all 5 tournaments in the Boulder Town Super League

5.Title: Moral Higher Ground
5.Desc: Confront the Public Property Protector and show him the cost of stopping you (or have him humbly acknowledge his wrongdoing.)

5.Title: Outworlder
5.Desc: Return the music box found in Rivet Town to its heartbroken owner

5.Title: 50 Credits!?
5.Desc: Collect all wanted posters of the Express Crew in Belobog

5.Title: Sweet Pom-Pom O'Mine
5.Desc: Try to give the Jarilo-VI's armillary sphere a spin to find... um... Pom-Pom on it?

5.Title: Where It All Began
5.Desc: Return to the room where the Stellaron was kept and recall a blurred memory

5.Title: Honest Abe
5.Desc: Pass the test of integrity set up by a mysterious researcher
